name: Meta Sports
description: META SPORTS is committed to become the worldâ€™s first sports metaverse blockchain platform with opening up NFT, DeFi, GameFi, Predictions at the same time. With one NFT as an ID can penetrate the entire platform. In the future, it will relate to reality, linking with many sports stars and peripheral products to create a real Sports Metaverse. Meta Football is the first chain game created with football as the background launched by Meta Sports Game platform, based on Binance Smart Chain. And it's not only PLAYTOEARN, the player NFTs will also map the World Cup results in real world, the users who hold the player NFT of the champion team will be available to split the super prize pool.
